util

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Random

  • public class Random
extends java.lang.Object
    Module class for generating randomness.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Random() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int[] randomCouple(int from, int to)
      Returns a couple of integers both between from (inclusive) and to (exclusive), and the first integer being strictly smaller than the second one.
      static int randomInteger(int from, int to)
      Returns a random integer between from (inclusive) and to (exclusive).
      static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> randomSample(int from, int to, int k)
      Randomly generates a list of k integers (without repetition), each integer being between from (inclusive) and to (exclusive).
      static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> randomShuffle(int from, int to)
      Generates a random sequence of the integers between from and to.
      static int[] randomTriplet(int from, int to)
      Returns a triplet of integers each one between from (inclusive) and to (exclusive), with integer being strictly smaller than the next.
      static int[] randomTwoPoints(int from, int to)
      Generates two random integers between from+1 (inclusive) and to (exclusive).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
